Class StudentListModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
cop3330.misc.GenericListModel<Student>
cop3330.misc.StudentListModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
public class StudentListModel extends GenericListModel<Student>
A table model for displaying a list of Student objects.

This class extends GenericListModel specialized with Student elements, providing the column headers and the data retrieval logic for each cell. The columns displayed are "ID", "Name", "Type", "Total Credit Hours", and "Tuition Due".

  • Method Details

    • getValueAt

      public Object getValueAt(int row, int column)
      Returns the value to be displayed at the specified row and column in the table.

      For the student table:

      • Column 0 returns the student ID
      • Column 1 returns the student name
      • Column 2 returns the student type/status
      • Column 3 returns the total credit hours
      • Column 4 returns the tuition due formatted as a decimal currency string
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the cell
      column - the column index of the cell
      Returns:
      the value for the specified cell, or null if the column is invalid

    • getColumns

      public String[] getColumns()
      Returns the names of the columns in the table.
      Specified by:
      getColumns in class GenericListModel<Student>
      Returns:
      an array of column names: "ID", "Name", "Type", "Total Credit Hours", and "Tuition Due"
